overview:
Currently CEO & Founder at LiveProcess, the leader in time-sensitive healthcare â€“ providing a software-as-a-service to hundreds of hospitals to optimize their planning, mobilization and response for large scale emergencies such as a chlorine spill or earthquake, and every-day clinical emergencies such as heart-attack patients, stroke, ED surge management, etc.

Prior to LiveProcess was CEO & Founder of GVOX, a leading music education and entertainment company that provides transcription and education software to movie studios and K-12.

Software entrepreneur with over 20 years experience building companies in the healthcare and entertainment industries.

Experience includes core technology design, general management, financing, business operations, and strategy.
